001package gbw.melange.events.observability.filters;
002
003import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.UndeterminedBiConsumer;
004import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.filters.IFallibleFilterChain;
005import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.filters.IFilterChain;
006import gbw.melange.common.events.observability.filters.IPristineFilterChain;
007
008import java.util.ArrayList;
009import java.util.List;
010import java.util.Objects;
011import java.util.function.Predicate;
012
013/**
014 * Entrypoint for retrieving FilterChain implementations. Both pristine and fallible.
015 *
016 * @param <T> Type of the type the consumers (filters) consume
017 * @param <R> Actual type of the consumer itself
018 *
019 * TODO: Refactor to ServiceLoader use when modularized
020 * @author GustavBW
021 * @version $Id: $Id
022 */
023public abstract class FilterChain<T, R extends UndeterminedBiConsumer<T>>
024        implements IFilterChain<R, Integer> {
025
026    protected final class FilterIdPair{
027        private R filter;
028        private final Integer id;
029
030        FilterIdPair(R filter, Integer id) {
031            this.filter = filter;
032            this.id = id;
033        }
034
035        public R filter() {
036            return filter;
037        }
038        public void setFilter(R filter){
039            this.filter = filter;
040        }
041
042        public Integer id() {
043            return id;
044        }
045
046        @Override
047        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
048            if (obj == this) return true;
049            if (obj == null || obj.getClass() != this.getClass()) return false;
050            try{
051                if(((FilterIdPair) obj).id().equals(this.id())) return true;
052            }catch (ClassCastException ignored){
053                return false;
054            }
055            return false;
056        }
057
058        @Override
059        public int hashCode() {
060            return Objects.hash(filter, id);
061        }
062
063        @Override
064        public String toString() {
065            return "FilterIdPair[" +
066                    "filter=" + filter + ", " +
067                    "id=" + id + ']';
068        }
069    }
070    protected final List<FilterIdPair> filters = new ArrayList<>();
071    private int latestId = 0;
072
073    /**
074     * <p>pristine.</p>
075     *
076     * @param <T> a T class
077     * @return a {@link gbw.melange.common.events.observability.filters.IPristineFilterChain} object
078     */
079    public static <T> IPristineFilterChain<T,Integer> pristine(){
080        return new PristineFilterChain<>();
081    }
082    /**
083     * <p>fallible.</p>
084     *
085     * @param <T> a T class
086     * @return a {@link gbw.melange.common.events.observability.filters.IFallibleFilterChain} object
087     */
088    public static <T> IFallibleFilterChain<T, Integer> fallible(){
089        return new FallibleFilterChain<>();
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * <p>getNextId.</p>
094     *
095     * @return a int
096     */
097    protected int getNextId(){
098        return latestId++;
099    }
100
101    /** {@inheritDoc} */
102    @Override
103    public Integer addFilter(R filter) {
104        int idOfThis = getNextId();
105        filters.add(new FilterIdPair(filter, idOfThis));
106        return idOfThis;
107    }
108    /** {@inheritDoc} */
109    @Override
110    public Integer addFilter(R filter, Integer identifier) {
111        if(containsById(identifier)){
112            return addFilter(filter);
113        }
114        filters.add(new FilterIdPair(filter, identifier));
115        return identifier;
116    }
117    /** {@inheritDoc} */
118    @Override
119    public boolean removeOnId(Integer identifier) {
120        FilterIdPair found = findFirst(identifier);
121        if(found != null){
122            return filters.remove(found);
123        }
124        return false;
125    }
126
127    /** {@inheritDoc} */
128    @Override
129    public boolean containsById(Integer identifier) {
130        return findFirst(identifier) != null;
131    }
132    /** {@inheritDoc} */
133    @Override
134    public boolean contains(R filter) {
135        return findFirst(filter) != null;
136    }
137    /** {@inheritDoc} */
138    @Override
139    public boolean removeFilter(R filter) {
140        FilterIdPair found = findFirst(filter);
141        if(found != null){
142            return filters.remove(found);
143        }
144        return false;
145    }
146    /** {@inheritDoc} */
147    @Override
148    public boolean replaceFilter(Integer identifier, R filter) {
149        FilterIdPair found = findFirst(identifier);
150        if(found != null){
151            found.setFilter(filter);
152            return true;
153        }
154        return false;
155    }
156    /**
157     * <p>findFirst.</p>
158     *
159     * @param filter a R object
160     * @return a {@link FilterChain.FilterIdPair} object
161     */
162    protected FilterIdPair findFirst(R filter){
163        return findFirst(pair -> filter == pair.filter());
164    }
165    /**
166     * <p>findFirst.</p>
167     *
168     * @param id a {@link java.lang.Integer} object
169     * @return a {@link FilterChain.FilterIdPair} object
170     */
171    protected FilterIdPair findFirst(Integer id){
172        return findFirst(pair -> Objects.equals(pair.id(), id));
173    }
174    /**
175     * <p>findFirst.</p>
176     *
177     * @param condition a {@link java.util.function.Predicate} object
178     * @return a {@link FilterChain.FilterIdPair} object
179     */
180    protected FilterIdPair findFirst(Predicate<FilterIdPair> condition){
181        for(FilterIdPair pair : filters){
182            if(condition.test(pair)){
183                return pair;
184            }
185        }
186        return null;
187    }
188}
